name: Tony B
text: Great pizza and cheese bread.  I personally think they have the best stuffed crust pizza.  Can never go wrong with Cajun or Garlic Herb crust!  I'm a little sad they raised their large carryout price by $1 (from $5.99 to $6.99) but the â€¦More

name: Chris Hughes
text: I love their pizza. Never - ever - could I recommend the subs.  My lettuce was brown and absolutely disgusting.  My tomatoes were barely pink and crunchy as a cucumber.  Awful sub, I couldn't eat it.

name: Dara C
text: Best pizza!! Better than Mellow Mushroom or any of the larger chains. I drive 20 minutes and pass 6 other pizza restaurants to get Hungry Howies pizza with butter crusts. The guys working here wash their hands 10 times per minute and are ways super nice.  I give them 10 stars!!! Love your pizza!!

name: aja harris
text: Let me just start by saying I LOVE THIS PLACE. Itâ€™s cost effective has great quality and super convenient as well as great service. Hailey is a stellar employee. She goes above and beyond to take care of our customers. Sheâ€™s always happy â€¦More

name: Archie Griffin
text: This is one great pizza place. They also have lots of great side items. Plus salads. You need to come check them out.

name: Fran Uebele
text: Delicious and made it just how we asked them to....stuffed bread was heavenly

name: Christopher Lavene
text:
Pretty good pizza. Good toppings, lots of extra sauce (as I ordered). Dude at the counter was friendly. It was ready right on time.
My first time here, and I thought the crust seasoning was a bit messy to eat.

name: Amy Newsome
text: As always great pizza and awesome customer service

name: Greg Hinkle
text: My favorite pizza chain..always visit this location when I'm in town..they always make a great pizza..wish we had more odd them in Texas.

name: Natonya Walton
text: Most days, I would give Hungry Howies a full 4 or 5 (I dont give 5s because no one's perfect). Today, I am surprised to receive 'short' responses when i called the restaurant.  I asked about my order, after being given an approximate 35 â€¦More

name: Sarah Taylor
text: Good pizza quick service

name: Kilia Foster
text: My family and I have always had wonderful service and food from this location. Occasionally they ran late with an order but overall provided a steady stream of good service. However, suddenly the website told us that they could no longer â€¦More

name: Michael Oriani
text: Pretty good pizza.  Reasonable price too.

name: Thaddeus Fennig
text: Love their pizza. Yesterday they were really slow and the pizza wasn't fully cooked though. I'm good with that but they didn't seem to offer anything other than a "sorry"

name: Delphine Miller
text: Me and my family enjoyed the pizza. My son Jr said it tastes better than Pizza Hut.  Thank you for great food and service ðŸ˜ŽðŸ˜ŽðŸ˜†ðŸ˜†

name: MTB Jackson
text: My spouse and I are regulars for this location. Always have excellent service and wonderful food. Tonight the young man that rang me up was incredibly polite and gave me excellent service. I didnâ€™t catch his name, but he had a portrait â€¦More

name: Joe Kerr
text: Great group of workers here. David the driver couldn't have been more polite. Rob the manager does a lot of fund raisers for the local schools and does a great job. â€¦More

name: Gallows
text: I've ordered several pizzas from this Hungry Howie's. Each pizza I received couldn't have turned out better. There was only one time that the pizza had a mishap (cheese slid off), but they quickly and efficiently fixed the problem. I love this Hungry Howie's so much. Those who deliver their pizzas are always the nicest.

name: Chris Benton
text: Worst experience ever. Never going back. Ordered my pizza online. Ordered at 6:04 to be there at 730. 7:30 no pizza called they said the pizza have not left yet and could not tell me when it would get to my house.  Came at 8:15 when it was â€¦More

name: Brandon Toney
text: By far the best cheese bread and the staff is fantastic!! Go here!

name: Rob Rudock
text: As chain Pizza goes it's always good. The flavored crusts are really good and Howie Rolls are a great deal and filling. Great comfort food all around

name: Ralph Duffus
text: I always spoke highly of this store until last night I got the worst pizza all the sauce and cheese was on one side of the pizza it was disappointing wonâ€™t be ordering from them again

name: james ingersoll
text:
This place is awesome...
I had ordered online and the ordered had gotten messed up and was sent to wrong store miles away... â€¦More

name: Logan Goodrich
text: Great pizza and wings. They were very fast and everything is delicious.

name: Kristie Gomm
text: I have had a very bad experience with hungry Howie's, the manager there was names Mary or Marie, was very rude, we had ordered 60.00 worth of food. I will be contacting ERIC the owner, this was very unpleasant experience, instead of saying â€¦More

name: Jonathan Heffner
text: It gets old calling up there 5 times and out of those times 4 of those they are out of deep dish dough. Somebody needs to get in there and understand the whole numbers game of how much product they need to make to satisfy customers!!!! Absolutely outrageous and unacceptable!!!!

name: Michael Casper
text: I love this place and its pizza! And Chris was very easy to work with when I requested a Pokemon pizza for my son's birthday!!

name: Kat Flowe
text: Pizza is great and made fresh!

name: Mike C
text: Great flavor crust, fast and friendly.

name: David Fisher
text: Super cheap prices are reflected in the product.  The stuffed crusts are interesting and different, but would rather have a better pie at a higher price.

name: Andre Costa
text: Good food and good service.

name: Clydia DAVIS
text: I have to disagree with comparison to lil caesars, with them yes its $5but all the pizza have the same boring taste regardless of the toppings.i dont think Hungry Howies expensive @All they always offering great promos. I think they hire â€¦More

name: David Scianna
text: Staff was very friendly and food served got and fresh. It was closing time and they still served me.

name: Ruvim
text: Little Caesars has the same exact pizza for a lower price!!!! So don't waste your money :)

name: Stuart Rosen
text: Because my daughter loves it is why I love it.

name: Santiago Bonilla
text: The crusts are amazing, pizza doesn't do so well if you want to reheat it.

name: Que Massey
text: Flavorless!

name: Ashton B
text: Great pizza, subs, and breads! Omg the brownies *yum yum*! I love hungryhowies!

name: Tony Blanco
text: Friendly service, clean kitchen and excellent tasting pizzas.

name: 95camaroz
text: Amazing food and even more amazing customer service very attentive to your order and delivery needs...thank you Hungry Howie's Indian Trail

name: Carey Wallace
text: While picking up my son at school this evening I watched a Hungry Howies delivery employee pull in and park in a handicapped space while she went in to make her delivery. Totally unacceptable behavior, I will never do business with this restaurant.

name: viael pzna
text: I love it..

name: Mario Joao Arellano
text: Quality Pizza!!!! Great taste!!!

name: Donna Reichert
text: Went to pick up my order and they couldn't find it. After 5 minutes looking they found the pizzas, not sure where they were, but the salad wasn't ready so had to wait.

name: K. Dillard
text: Not all that I was expecting. Only person in there and with 5 employees in site. 5 minutes went by before anyone said anything to me.

name: Fred Smith
text: Great community presence and deals!!!

name: Ashley Jackson
text: Frequently mess up order, but with a coupon it's a good value

name: Alex Harrison
text: Well they forgot my 3 cheeser bread last night and since I didn't call immediately they won't give me some type of credit or a replacement. Thank you but you shove it where the sun don't shine.

name: William Goins
text: Many delivery places are unwilling to deliver to semi truck. They not only delivered in record time, but the customer service was amazing

name: Alphia Sauer
text: The pizza is very tasty

name: Kimberly Yates
text: Good

name: Evan Epp
text: Awesome Pizza!

name: Jessica Semler
text: Their prices are too high

name: Akanaga Cynthia
text: Pizza was delicious

name: Juli Mora
text: We ordered pizza and it Never came so we called and they said they could take he order again. So.....no thanks

name: Amanda Van De Velde
text: Is zero stars an option? I ordered a pizza 2 hours ago. It's still not here.

name: Lindsey price
text: Great people there love it

name: Ryan Place
text: Order placed at 12:28 pm, driver did not deliver until 2:15 pm. Never again.

name: Alvaro Navia Suarez
text:
(Translated by Google) I love your pizzas

(Original)
Me encantan sus pizzas
